header02: The path to growth is attained only through efford and consistency.
S&E_text01: Based on my personal choice and time spent learning, I have stronger skills on the front-end, the visual aspect is of big importance and on that I feel like a Monet looking to create my Lady with the Umbrella.
S&E_text02: I have learned HTML and CSS, then went on to Javascript, then Sass. I decided to go to React as my framework(library) of choice, not because of it`s popularity, but because of it`s component based structure and workflow.
S&E_text03: But anyway, i don`t mean to leave you on a cliffhanger but if you want to hear more about my learning path and work experience, feel free to contact me.
exp01_text: An Agency for webdesign, online markting, campaining, social media, CMS and IT Infrastructure.
ed01_text: Administration thought me basic accounting, mathematics, business, etc. in which I worked for a year as a intern secretary/accountant.
ed02_title: The Complete Web Developer in 2019 - Zero to Mastery
ed02_text: A course with 37 hours that gave me knowledge in HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, Node.js, Express.js, React.js with Redux, PostgressSQL, SQL.
ed03_text: Excelente course which goes deep in the basic concepts of computer science such as algorithms and data structures, also C, Python and SQL.
ed04_text: 52 hours of intense pain with advanced concepts of REACT.js with redux.
ed05_text: This course teaches tons of modern CSS techniques, advanced CSS animations, Flexbox layouts, CSS Grid layouts and more. 28h in total.
